QuestData.Title: Entry Into the Black Temple
QuestData.Description: <A'dal shows you an image of a naaru outside of the Black Temple, fighting alongside draenei vindicators and blood elf magisters. You immediately understand that this is the distraction Akama is waiting for.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the entrance to the Black Temple in Shadowmoon Valley and speak to Xi'ri.
QuestData.RewardText: <Xi'ri appears to acknowledge your presence. He seems to be focused on the battle in the surrounding area.>
